name: TOMOS Software
tag_list: testing, test-management, application-life-cycle, requirements, defect-tracking, test-case, test-plan, quality
overview:
TOMOS is a software quality management solution.

As a web 2.0, SaaS solution that is targeted at Analysts, Developers, Testers and Managers, TOMOS provides modules for requirements management, test case authoring & test execution and defect tracking, along with a built-in methodology for each module and workflows for each role.

TOMOS provides the team with a distributed software (web 2.0) that feeds into a centralized database. This facilitates full traceability of assets from requirements to test cases to defects and provides a full audit trail of changes to anything. The interface has been designed to provide a similar look-and-feel to Microsoft Office, minimizing the ramp-up time. Collaboration functions such as email notification and document & file sharing promote faster and better communication throughout the team.

As a SaaS application, there are no installation or maintenance costs and upgrades are made to a central code base, allowing for faster rollout of new features and fixes.

external_links.title: New SaaS Tool Eases the Stress of Software Development
